trans-unit.source: Provides the underlying stream of data for network access.
trans-unit.target: Fornece o fluxo de dados subjacente para acesso à rede.

trans-unit.source: The NetworkStream class provides methods for sending and receiving data over <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketType> sockets in blocking mode.
trans-unit.target: A classe NetworkStream fornece métodos para enviar e receber dados pela <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketType>sockets no modo de bloqueio.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketType>

trans-unit.source: For more information about blocking versus nonblocking <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>s, see [Using an Asynchronous Client Socket](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o bloqueio sem bloqueio <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>s, consulte [usando um soquete do cliente assíncrono](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: You can use the NetworkStream class for both synchronous and asynchronous data transfer.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar a classe NetworkStream ambos síncronas e assíncronas para transferência de dados.

trans-unit.source: For more information about synchronous and asynchronous communication, see [Sockets](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a comunicação síncrona e assíncrona, consulte [soquetes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To create a NetworkStream, you must provide a connected <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: Para criar um NetworkStream, você deve fornecer um <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> conectado

trans-unit.source: You can also specify what <xref:System.IO.FileAccess> permission the NetworkStream has over the provided <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode especificar que a <xref:System.IO.FileAccess>permissão a NetworkStream tem sobre o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> fornecido</xref:System.IO.FileAccess>

trans-unit.source: By default, closing the NetworkStream does not close the provided <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, fechar o NetworkStream não fecha o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> fornecido

trans-unit.source: If you want the NetworkStream to have permission to close the provided <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, you must specify `true` for the value of the `ownsSocket` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Se você quiser NetworkStream tenha permissão para fechar fornecido <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, você deve especificar `true` para o valor da `ownsSocket` parâmetro.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A> methods for simple single thread synchronous blocking I/O.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A>e <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A>métodos de um único simple e/s síncronas bloqueio de thread.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want to process your I/O using separate threads, consider using the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndWrite%2A> methods, or the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndRead%2A> methods for communication.
trans-unit.target: Se você quiser processar a e/s usando threads separados, considere o uso de <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A>e <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndWrite%2A>métodos, ou o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A>e <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndRead%2A>métodos de comunicação.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndRead%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndWrite%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A>

trans-unit.source: The NetworkStream does not support random access to the network data stream.
trans-unit.target: O NetworkStream não oferece suporte a acesso aleatório ao fluxo de dados de rede.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanSeek%2A> property, which indicates whether the stream supports seeking, is always `false`; reading the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Position%2A> property, reading the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Length%2A> property, or calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Seek%2A> method will throw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanSeek%2A>propriedade, o que indica se o fluxo oferece suporte à busca, é sempre `false`; ler a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Position%2A>propriedade, ler a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Length%2A>propriedade, ou chamando o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Seek%2A>método lançará um <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Seek%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Length%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Position%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanSeek%2A>

trans-unit.source: Read and write operations can be performed simultaneously on an instance of the NetworkStream class without the need for synchronization.
trans-unit.target: Operações de leitura e gravação podem ser executadas simultaneamente em uma instância da classe NetworkStream sem a necessidade de sincronização.

trans-unit.source: As long as there is one unique thread for the write operations and one unique thread for the read operations, there will be no cross-interference between read and write threads and no synchronization is required.
trans-unit.target: Como há um thread exclusivo para as operações de gravação e um thread exclusivo para as operações de leitura, haverá sem interferência entre leitura e gravação threads e nenhuma sincronização é necessária.

trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref> classe para <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> especificado

trans-unit.source: If you specify <xref:System.IO.FileAccess>, then the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> allows calls to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se você especificar <xref:System.IO.FileAccess>, em seguida, o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>permite chamadas para o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> </xref:System.IO.FileAccess>

trans-unit.target: Se você especificar <xref:System.IO.FileAccess>, em seguida, o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>permite chamadas para o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> </xref:System.IO.FileAccess>

trans-unit.source: If you specify <xref:System.IO.FileAccess>, both method calls are allowed.
trans-unit.target: Se você especificar <xref:System.IO.FileAccess>, as duas chamadas de método são permitidas.</xref:System.IO.FileAccess>

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous read from the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Começa uma leitura assíncrona a partir de <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The BeginRead method starts asynchronously reading data from the incoming network buffers.
trans-unit.target: O método BeginRead inicia a leitura assíncrona dos dados dos buffers de rede de entrada.

trans-unit.source: Calling the BeginRead method gives you the ability to receive data within a separate execution thread.
trans-unit.target: Chamando o método BeginRead fornece a capacidade de receber dados dentro de um thread de execução separado.

trans-unit.source: You must create a callback method that implements the <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate and pass its name to the BeginRead method.
trans-unit.target: Você deve criar um método de retorno de chamada que implementa o <xref:System.AsyncCallback>delegar e passar o nome para o método BeginRead.</xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: At the very minimum, your `state` parameter must contain the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>.
trans-unit.target: No mínimo, o `state` parâmetro deve conter <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: Because you will want to obtain the received data within your callback method, you should create a small class or structure to hold a read buffer and any other useful information.
trans-unit.target: Como deseja obter os dados recebidos dentro de seu método de retorno de chamada, você deve criar uma pequena classe ou estrutura para manter um buffer de leitura e quaisquer outras informações úteis.

trans-unit.source: Pass the structure or class instance to the BeginRead method through the `state` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Passe a instância de classe ou estrutura para o método BeginRead por meio de `state` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: Your callback method should call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndRead%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O método de retorno de chamada deve chamar o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndRead%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndRead%2A>

trans-unit.source: When your application calls BeginRead, the system will wait until data is received or an error occurs, and then the system will use a separate thread to execute the specified callback method, and blocks on <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndRead%2A> until the provided <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> reads data or throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: Quando o aplicativo chama BeginRead, o sistema aguardará até que os dados são recebidos ou ocorrerá um erro e, em seguida, o sistema usará um thread separado para executar o método de retorno de chamada especificada e blocos em <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndRead%2A>até fornecido <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>lê os dados ou gera uma exceção.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndRead%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want the original thread to block after you call the BeginRead method, use the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se você quiser que o thread original para bloquear depois de chamar o método BeginRead, use o <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne%2A>método.</xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne%2A>

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.Set%2A> in the callback method when you want the original thread to continue executing.
trans-unit.target: Chamar <xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.Set%2A>no método de retorno de chamada quando o thread original para continuar a executar.</xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.Set%2A>

trans-unit.source: For additional information about writing callback methods, see [Marshaling a Delegate as a Callback Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações adicionais sobre métodos de retorno de chamada de gravação, consulte [Marshaling de um delegado como um método de retorno de chamada](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The BeginRead method reads as much data as is available, up to the number of bytes specified by the `size` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O método BeginRead lê a quantidade de dados estiver disponível, até o número de bytes especificado pelo `size` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you receive an <xref:System.IO.IOException>, check the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property to determine if it was caused by a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se você receber um <xref:System.IO.IOException>Verifique a <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>propriedade para determinar se ele foi causado por um <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.IO.IOException>

trans-unit.source: If so, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A> property to obtain the specific error code, and refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, use o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A>propriedade para obter o código de erro específico e consulte a Windows Sockets versão 2 API documentação códigos de erro no MSDN para obter uma descrição detalhada do erro.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Read and write operations can be performed simultaneously on an instance of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> class without the need for synchronization.
trans-unit.target: Ler e gravar operações podem ser executadas simultaneamente em uma instância do <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>classe sem a necessidade de sincronização.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: As long as there is one unique thread for the write operations and one unique thread for the read operations, there will be no cross-interference between read and write threads and no synchronization is required.
trans-unit.target: Como há um thread exclusivo para as operações de gravação e um thread exclusivo para as operações de leitura, haverá sem interferência entre leitura e gravação threads e nenhuma sincronização é necessária.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref:System.Byte> that is the location in memory to store data read from the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz do tipo <xref:System.Byte>que é o local na memória para armazenar dados lidos do <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref>.</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: The location in `buffer` to begin storing the data.
trans-unit.target: O local em `buffer` para começar a armazenar os dados.

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes to read from the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O número de bytes a ler a partir de <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate that is executed when BeginRead completes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.AsyncCallback>representante que é executado quando BeginRead for concluída.</xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: An object that contains any additional user-defined data.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que contém dados adicionais definidos pelo usuário.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that represents the asynchronous call.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.IAsyncResult>que representa a chamada assíncrona.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: The buffer parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The buffer parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The offset parameter is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: O offset parâmetro é menor que 0.

trans-unit.source: -or- The offset parameter is greater than the length of the buffer paramater.
trans-unit.target: - ou - offset parâmetro for maior que o comprimento do buffer parâmetro inválido.

trans-unit.source: -or- The size is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: - ou - size é menor que 0.

trans-unit.source: -or- The size is greater than the length of buffer minus the value of the offset parameter.
trans-unit.target: - ou - size é maior que o comprimento de buffer menos o valor da offset parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: The underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> is closed.
trans-unit.target: Subjacente <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>está fechado.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: -or- There was a failure while reading from the network.
trans-unit.target: - ou - houve uma falha durante a leitura da rede.

trans-unit.source: -or- An error occurred when accessing the socket.
trans-unit.target: - ou - ocorreu um erro ao acessar o soquete.

trans-unit.source: See the Remarks section for more information.
trans-unit.target: Consulte a seção de comentários para obter mais informações.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref> is closed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref> está fechado.

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous write to a stream.
trans-unit.target: Começa uma gravação assíncrona em um fluxo.

trans-unit.source: The BeginWrite method starts an asynchronous send operation to the remote host.
trans-unit.target: O método BeginWrite inicia uma operação de envio assíncrono para o host remoto.

trans-unit.source: Calling the BeginWrite method gives you the ability to send data within a separate execution thread.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o método BeginWrite fornece a capacidade de enviar dados dentro de um thread de execução separado.

trans-unit.source: You must create a callback method that implements the <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate and pass its name to the BeginWrite method.
trans-unit.target: Você deve criar um método de retorno de chamada que implementa o <xref:System.AsyncCallback>delegar e passar o nome para o método BeginWrite.</xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: At the very minimum, your `state` parameter must contain the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>.
trans-unit.target: No mínimo, o `state` parâmetro deve conter <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: If your callback needs more information, you can create a small class or structure to hold the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> and the other required information.
trans-unit.target: Se o retorno de chamada precisa de mais informações, você pode criar uma pequena classe ou estrutura para manter o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>e outras informações necessárias.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: Pass the structure or class instance to the BeginWrite method through the `state` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Passe a instância de classe ou estrutura para o método BeginWrite por meio de `state` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: Your callback method should implement the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndWrite%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O método de retorno de chamada deve implementar o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndWrite%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndWrite%2A>

trans-unit.source: When your application calls BeginWrite, the system uses a separate thread to execute the specified callback method, and blocks on <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndWrite%2A> until the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> sends the number of bytes requested or throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: Quando o aplicativo chama BeginWrite, o sistema usa um thread separado para executar o método de retorno de chamada especificada e blocos em <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndWrite%2A>até que o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>envia o número de bytes solicitado ou gera uma exceção.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndWrite%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want the original thread to block after you call the BeginWrite method, use the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se você quiser que o thread original para bloquear depois de chamar o método BeginWrite, use o <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne%2A>método.</xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne%2A>

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.Set%2A> in the callback method when you want the original thread to continue executing.
trans-unit.target: Chamar <xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.Set%2A>no método de retorno de chamada quando o thread original para continuar a executar.</xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.Set%2A>

trans-unit.source: For additional information about writing callback methods, see [Marshaling a Delegate as a Callback Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações adicionais sobre métodos de retorno de chamada de gravação, consulte [Marshaling de um delegado como um método de retorno de chamada](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se você receber um <xref:System.IO.IOException>Verifique a <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>propriedade para determinar se ele foi causado por um <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.IO.IOException>

trans-unit.source: If so, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A> property to obtain the specific error code, and refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error.

trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref> oferece suporte à leitura.

trans-unit.source: If CanRead is `true`, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> allows calls to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se for CanRead `true`, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>permite chamadas para o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: Provide the appropriate <xref:System.IO.FileAccess> enumerated value in the constructor to set the readability and writability of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>.
trans-unit.target: Fornecer apropriado <xref:System.IO.FileAccess>enumerados valor no construtor para definir a legibilidade de gravabilidade de <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> </xref:System.IO.FileAccess>

trans-unit.source: The CanRead property is set when the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> is initialized.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade CanRead é definida quando o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>é inicializado.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if data can be read from the stream; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se os dados podem ser lidos do fluxo; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the stream supports seeking.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o fluxo oferece suporte à busca.

trans-unit.source: This property is not currently supported.This property always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Atualmente, não há suporte para essa propriedade. Essa propriedade sempre retorna <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases to indicate that <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref> cannot seek a specific location in the stream.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>em todos os casos para indicar que <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref> não é possível procurar um local específico no fluxo.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether timeout properties are usable for <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Indica se as propriedades de tempo limite pode ser usadas para <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property is present because it is inherited from <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade está presente porque ela é herdada do <xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>em todos os casos.

trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref> oferece suporte à gravação.

trans-unit.target: Se for CanWrite `true`, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>permite chamadas para o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: Provide the appropriate <xref:System.IO.FileAccess> enumerated value in the constructor to set the readability and writability of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>.
trans-unit.target: Fornecer apropriado <xref:System.IO.FileAccess>enumerados valor no construtor para definir a legibilidade de gravabilidade de <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> </xref:System.IO.FileAccess>

trans-unit.target: A propriedade CanWrite é definida quando o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>é inicializado.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if data can be written to the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se os dados podem ser gravados para o <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Closes the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref> after waiting the specified time to allow data to be sent.
trans-unit.target: Fecha o <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref> depois de aguardar o tempo especificado para permitir que os dados a serem enviados.

trans-unit.source: The Close method frees both unmanaged and managed resources associated with the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>.
trans-unit.target: O método Close libera os recursos gerenciados e não associados a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> owns the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, it is closed as well.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>possui subjacente <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, também está fechado.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> was associated with a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>, the Close method will close the TCP connection, but not dispose of the associated <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>.
trans-unit.target: Se um <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>associado a um <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>o método Close fechará a conexão TCP, mas não descarte associado <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer that specifies the number of milliseconds to wait to send any remaining data before closing.
trans-unit.target: Um inteiro de 32 bits assinado que especifica o número de milissegundos de espera para enviar todos os dados restantes antes de fechar.

trans-unit.source: The timeout parameter is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: O timeout parâmetro é menor que -1.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether data is available on the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref> to be read.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se os dados estão disponíveis no <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref> a ser lido.

trans-unit.source: Use the DataAvailable property to determine if data is ready to be read.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade DataAvailable para determinar se os dados estão prontos para ser lido.

trans-unit.source: If DataAvailable is `true`, a call to <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A> returns immediately.
trans-unit.target: Se for DataAvailable `true`, uma chamada para <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A>retorna imediatamente.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the remote host shuts down or closes the connection, DataAvailable may throw a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: Se o host remoto é desligado ou fecha a conexão, DataAvailable poderá gerar <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if data is available on the stream to be read; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se houver dados disponíveis no fluxo a ser lido; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref> is closed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref> está fechado.

trans-unit.source: The underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> is closed.
trans-unit.target: Subjacente <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>está fechado.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to obtain the specific error code, and refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> propriedade para obter o código de erro específico e consulte a Windows Sockets versão 2 API documentação códigos de erro no MSDN para obter uma descrição detalhada do erro.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref> e, opcionalmente, libera os recursos gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo público `Dispose` método e o <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>método.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`invoca o protegido `Dispose(Boolean)` método com o `disposing` parâmetro definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro é `true`, esse método libera todos os recursos mantidos por qualquer objeto gerenciado que este <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>referências.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método chama o `Dispose` método de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Handles the end of an asynchronous read.
trans-unit.target: Manipula o final de uma leitura assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: The EndRead method completes the asynchronous read operation started in the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O método EndRead conclui a operação de leitura assíncrona iniciada no <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A>

trans-unit.source: Before calling <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A>, you need to create a callback method that implements the <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate.
trans-unit.target: Antes de chamar <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A>, você precisa criar um método de retorno de chamada que implementa o <xref:System.AsyncCallback>delegar.</xref:System.AsyncCallback> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A>

trans-unit.source: This callback method executes in a separate thread and is called by the system after <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A> returns.
trans-unit.target: Esse método de retorno de chamada é executado em um thread separado e é chamado pelo sistema após <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A>retorna.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A>

trans-unit.source: The callback method must accept the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> returned from the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A> method as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: O método de retorno de chamada deve aceitar o <xref:System.IAsyncResult>retornado do <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A>método como um parâmetro.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A> </xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Within the callback method, call the <xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A> property of the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> to obtain the state object passed to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Dentro do método de retorno de chamada, chame o <xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.IAsyncResult>para obter o objeto de estado passado para o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A> </xref:System.IAsyncResult> </xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Extract the receiving <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> from this state object.
trans-unit.target: Extrair o recebimento <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>deste objeto de estado.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: After obtaining the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>, call the EndRead method to successfully complete the read operation and return the number of bytes read.
trans-unit.target: Depois de obter o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>, chame o método EndRead para concluir a operação de leitura e retornar o número de bytes lidos com êxito.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: The EndRead method blocks until data is available.
trans-unit.target: Os blocos de método EndRead até que os dados estão disponíveis.

trans-unit.source: The EndRead method reads as much data as is available up to the number of bytes specified in the `size` parameter of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O método EndRead lê a quantidade de dados está disponível até o número de bytes especificado no `size` parâmetro o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the remote host shuts down the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> connection and all available data has been received, the EndRead method completes immediately and returns zero bytes.
trans-unit.target: Se o host remoto desliga o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>todos os dados disponíveis e conexão foi recebida, o método EndRead é concluído imediatamente e retorna zero bytes.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: To obtain the received data, call the <xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A> property of the <xref:System.IAsyncResult>, and extract the buffer contained in the resulting state object.
trans-unit.target: Para obter os dados recebidos, chame o <xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.IAsyncResult>e extraia o buffer contido no objeto de estado resultante.</xref:System.IAsyncResult> </xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you receive an <xref:System.IO.IOException>, check the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property to determine if it was caused by a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se você receber um <xref:System.IO.IOException>Verifique a <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>propriedade para determinar se ele foi causado por um <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.IO.IOException>

trans-unit.source: If so, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A> property to obtain the specific error code, and refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, use o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A>propriedade para obter o código de erro específico e consulte a Windows Sockets versão 2 API documentação códigos de erro no MSDN para obter uma descrição detalhada do erro.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that represents an asynchronous call.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.IAsyncResult>que representa uma chamada assíncrona.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes read from the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O número de bytes lidos do <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The asyncResult parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The asyncResult parameter is .

trans-unit.target: Subjacente <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>está fechado.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: -or- An error occurred when accessing the socket.
trans-unit.target: - ou - ocorreu um erro ao acessar o soquete.

trans-unit.source: See the Remarks section for more information.
trans-unit.target: Consulte a seção de comentários para obter mais informações.

trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref> está fechado.

trans-unit.source: Handles the end of an asynchronous write.
trans-unit.target: Manipula o final de uma gravação assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: EndWrite completes the asynchronous send operation started in <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A>.
trans-unit.target: EndWrite conclui a operação de envio assíncrono iniciada em <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A>

trans-unit.source: Before calling <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A>, you need to create a callback method that implements the <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate.
trans-unit.target: Antes de chamar <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A>, você precisa criar um método de retorno de chamada que implementa o <xref:System.AsyncCallback>delegar.</xref:System.AsyncCallback> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A>

trans-unit.source: This callback method executes in a separate thread and is called by the system after <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A> returns.
trans-unit.target: Esse método de retorno de chamada é executado em um thread separado e é chamado pelo sistema após <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A>retorna.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A>

trans-unit.source: The callback method must accept the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> returned from the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A> method as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: O método de retorno de chamada deve aceitar o <xref:System.IAsyncResult>retornado do <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A>método como um parâmetro.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A> </xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Within the callback method, call the <xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A> property of the `IAsyncResult` parameter to obtain the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>.
trans-unit.target: Dentro do método de retorno de chamada, chame o <xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A>propriedade o `IAsyncResult` parâmetro obter <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> </xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A>

trans-unit.source: After obtaining the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>, you can call the EndWrite method to successfully complete the send operation and return the number of bytes sent.
trans-unit.target: Depois de obter o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>, você pode chamar o método EndWrite para concluir a operação de envio e retornar o número de bytes enviados com êxito.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: The EndWrite method blocks until the requested number of bytes are sent.
trans-unit.target: Os blocos de método EndWrite até que o número solicitado de bytes é enviado.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you receive an <xref:System.IO.IOException>, check the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property to determine if it was caused by a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se você receber um <xref:System.IO.IOException>Verifique a <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>propriedade para determinar se ele foi causado por um <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.IO.IOException>

trans-unit.source: If so, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A> property to obtain the specific error code, and refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, use o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A>propriedade para obter o código de erro específico e consulte a Windows Sockets versão 2 API documentação códigos de erro no MSDN para obter uma descrição detalhada do erro.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A>

trans-unit.target: - ou - ocorreu um erro ao gravar na rede.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos os recursos usados pelo <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Esse método substitui <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Application code should not call this method; an object's <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Código do aplicativo não deve chamar esse método; um objeto <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>método é invocado automaticamente durante a coleta de lixo, a menos que a finalização pelo coletor de lixo foi desabilitada por uma chamada para o <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about using the Finalize method, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como usar o método Finalize, consulte [métodos Finalize e destruidores](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [limpeza de recursos não gerenciados](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), e [substituindo o método Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: Flushes data from the stream.
trans-unit.target: Libera os dados do fluxo.

trans-unit.source: This method is reserved for future use.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é reservado para uso futuro.

trans-unit.source: The Flush method implements the <xref:System.IO.Stream.Flush%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method; however, because <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> is not buffered, it has no affect on network streams.
trans-unit.target: O método de liberação que implementa o <xref:System.IO.Stream.Flush%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método; no entanto, porque <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>não é armazenado em buffer, ela não terá efeito nos fluxos de rede.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> </xref:System.IO.Stream.Flush%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Calling the Flush method does not throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o método de liberação não lançará uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: Flushes data from the stream as an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Libera os dados do fluxo como uma operação assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: This operation will not block.
trans-unit.target: Essa operação não será bloqueada.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> object will complete after data has been flushed from the stream for the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> instance.
trans-unit.target: Retornado <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>objeto será concluída depois que foi liberados do fluxo de dados a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>instância.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> </xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>

trans-unit.source: A cancellation token used to propagate notification that this operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: Um token de cancelamento usado para propagar a notificação de que essa operação deve ser cancelada.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>.
trans-unit.target: Retorna <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>.</xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>

trans-unit.source: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de tarefa que representa a operação assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: Gets the length of the data available on the stream.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o comprimento dos dados disponíveis no fluxo.

trans-unit.source: This property is not currently supported and always throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não é suportada atualmente e sempre lança <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: The length of the data available on the stream.
trans-unit.target: O comprimento dos dados disponíveis no fluxo.

trans-unit.source: Any use of this property.
trans-unit.target: Qualquer uso dessa propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current position in the stream.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a posição atual no fluxo.

trans-unit.source: This property is not currently supported and always throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não é suportada atualmente e sempre lança <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: The current position in the stream.
trans-unit.target: A posição atual no fluxo.

trans-unit.source: Any use of this property.
trans-unit.target: Qualquer uso dessa propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Reads data from the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lê dados do <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method reads data into the `buffer` parameter and returns the number of bytes successfully read.
trans-unit.target: Esse método lê os dados para o `buffer` parâmetro e retorna o número de bytes lidos com êxito.

trans-unit.source: If no data is available for reading, the Read method returns 0.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum dado está disponível para leitura, o método de leitura retornará 0.

trans-unit.source: The Read operation reads as much data as is available, up to the number of bytes specified by the `size` parameter.
trans-unit.target: A operação de leitura lê a quantidade de dados estiver disponível, até o número de bytes especificado pelo `size` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: If the remote host shuts down the connection, and all available data has been received, the Read method completes immediately and return zero bytes.
trans-unit.target: Se o host remoto fecha a conexão e todos os dados disponíveis foi recebida, o método de leitura é concluída imediatamente e retornar zero bytes.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Check to see if the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> is readable by calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanRead%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Verificar se o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>está legível chamando o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanRead%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanRead%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to read from a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> that is not readable, you will get an <xref:System.IO.IOException>.
trans-unit.target: Se você tentar ler de um <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>não legível, você obterá um <xref:System.IO.IOException>.</xref:System.IO.IOException> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you receive an <xref:System.IO.IOException>, check the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property to determine if it was caused by a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se você receber um <xref:System.IO.IOException>Verifique a <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>propriedade para determinar se ele foi causado por um <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.IO.IOException>

trans-unit.source: If so, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A> property to obtain the specific error code, and refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, use o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A>propriedade para obter o código de erro específico e consulte a Windows Sockets versão 2 API documentação códigos de erro no MSDN para obter uma descrição detalhada do erro.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A>

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref:System.Byte> that is the location in memory to store data read from the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz do tipo <xref:System.Byte>que é o local na memória para armazenar dados lidos do <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref>.</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: The location in `buffer` to begin storing the data to.
trans-unit.target: O local em `buffer` para começar a armazenar os dados.

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes to read from the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O número de bytes a ler a partir de <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes read from the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O número de bytes lidos do <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The buffer parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The buffer parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The offset parameter is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: O offset parâmetro é menor que 0.

trans-unit.source: -or- The offset parameter is greater than the length of buffer.
trans-unit.target: - ou - offset parâmetro for maior que o comprimento de buffer .

trans-unit.source: -or- The size parameter is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: - ou - size parâmetro é menor que 0.

trans-unit.source: -or- The size parameter is greater than the length of buffer minus the value of the offset parameter.
trans-unit.target: - ou - size parâmetro for maior que o comprimento de buffer menos o valor da offset parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: -or- An error occurred when accessing the socket.
trans-unit.target: - ou - ocorreu um erro ao acessar o soquete.

trans-unit.source: See the Remarks section for more information.
trans-unit.target: Consulte a seção de comentários para obter mais informações.

trans-unit.source: The underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> is closed.
trans-unit.target: Subjacente <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>está fechado.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref> is closed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref> está fechado.

trans-unit.source: -or- There is a failure reading from the network.
trans-unit.target: - ou - Falha ao ler da rede.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref> can be read.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref> podem ser lidos.

trans-unit.source: You must derive from the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> class to use the Readable property.
trans-unit.target: Você deve derivar do <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>classe para usar a propriedade legível.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: If Readable is `true`, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> allows calls to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se for legível `true`, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>permite chamadas para o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: You can also determine whether a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> is readable by checking the publicly accessible <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanRead%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode determinar se um <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>é legível verificando publicamente acessível <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanRead%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanRead%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: The Readable property is set when the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> is initialized.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade legível é definida quando o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>é inicializado.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref> can be read; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para indicar que o <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref> pode ser lido; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of time that a read operation blocks waiting for data.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a quantidade de tempo que uma operação de leitura blocos aguardando dados.

trans-unit.source: If the read operation does not complete within the time specified by this property, the read operation throws an <xref:System.IO.IOException>.
trans-unit.target: Se a operação de leitura não for concluída dentro do tempo especificado por essa propriedade, a operação de leitura lança um <xref:System.IO.IOException>.</xref:System.IO.IOException>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property affects only synchronous reads performed by calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Essa propriedade afeta apenas síncronas Leituras executadas por chamar o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property does not affect asynchronous reads performed by calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não afeta as Leituras assíncronas executadas chamando o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Int32> that specifies the amount of time, in milliseconds, that will elapse before a read operation fails.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Int32>que especifica a quantidade de tempo, em milissegundos, que deverá decorrer antes da falha de uma operação de leitura.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The default value, <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite>, specifies that the read operation does not time out.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão, <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite>, especifica que a operação de leitura não expira.</xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite>

trans-unit.source: The value specified is less than or equal to zero and is not <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite>.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado é menor que ou igual a zero e não é <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite>.</xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite>

trans-unit.source: Sets the current position of the stream to the given value.
trans-unit.target: Define a posição atual do fluxo como o valor especificado.

trans-unit.target: Este método não é suportado atualmente e sempre gera um <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.target: Esse parâmetro não for usado.

trans-unit.target: A posição no fluxo.

trans-unit.target: Qualquer uso dessa propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Sets the length of the stream.
trans-unit.target: Define o comprimento do fluxo.

trans-unit.source: This method always throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: Este método lança sempre <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.target: Esse parâmetro não for usado.

trans-unit.target: Qualquer uso dessa propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> subjacente

trans-unit.source: Classes deriving from <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> can use this property to get the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: Classes derivadas de <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>pode usar essa propriedade para obter o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> subjacente</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: Use the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> returned from the Socket property if you require access beyond that which <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> provides.
trans-unit.target: Use subjacente <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>retornada da propriedade soquete se você precisar de acesso além do qual <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>fornece.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is accessible only through this class or a derived class.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Esta propriedade é acessível somente por meio dessa classe ou uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> that represents the underlying network connection.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>que representa a conexão de rede subjacente.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: Writes data to the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Grava dados para o <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Write method starts at the specified `offset` and sends `size` bytes from the contents of `buffer` to the network.
trans-unit.target: O método Write é iniciado no local especificado `offset` e envia `size` bytes do conteúdo do `buffer` à rede.

trans-unit.source: The Write method blocks until the requested number of bytes is sent or a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: O método Write bloqueia até que o número solicitado de bytes seja enviado ou um <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>é gerada.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to obtain the specific error code, and refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: Se você receber um <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade para obter o código de erro específico e consulte a Windows Sockets versão 2 API documentação códigos de erro no MSDN para obter uma descrição detalhada do erro.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Check to see if the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> is writable by accessing the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanWrite%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Verificar se o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>é gravável, acessando o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanWrite%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanWrite%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to write to a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> that is not writable, you will get an <xref:System.IO.IOException>.
trans-unit.target: Se você tentar gravar uma <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>não gravável, você obterá um <xref:System.IO.IOException>.</xref:System.IO.IOException> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: If you receive an <xref:System.IO.IOException>, check the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property to determine if it was caused by a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: Se você receber um <xref:System.IO.IOException>Verifique a <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>propriedade para determinar se ele foi causado por um <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.IO.IOException>

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref:System.Byte> that contains the data to write to the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz do tipo <xref:System.Byte>que contém os dados para gravar o <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref>.</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: The location in `buffer` from which to start writing data.
trans-unit.target: O local no `buffer` da qual iniciar a gravação de dados.

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes to write to the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O número de bytes a serem gravados para o <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The buffer parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The buffer parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The offset parameter is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: O offset parâmetro é menor que 0.

trans-unit.source: -or- The offset parameter is greater than the length of buffer.
trans-unit.target: - ou - offset parâmetro for maior que o comprimento de buffer .

trans-unit.source: -or- The size parameter is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: - ou - size parâmetro é menor que 0.

trans-unit.source: -or- The size parameter is greater than the length of buffer minus the value of the offset parameter.
trans-unit.target: - ou - size parâmetro for maior que o comprimento de buffer menos o valor da offset parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: There was a failure while writing to the network.
trans-unit.target: Houve uma falha durante a gravação da rede.

trans-unit.source: -or- An error occurred when accessing the socket.
trans-unit.target: - ou - ocorreu um erro ao acessar o soquete.

trans-unit.source: See the Remarks section for more information.
trans-unit.target: Consulte a seção de comentários para obter mais informações.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref> is closed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref> está fechado.

trans-unit.source: -or- There was a failure reading from the network.
trans-unit.target: - ou - houve uma falha de leitura da rede.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref> is writable.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref> é gravável.

trans-unit.source: You must derive from the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> class to use the Writeable property.
trans-unit.target: Você deve derivar do <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>classe para usar a propriedade Writeable.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: If Writeable is `true`, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> allows calls to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se for Writeable `true`, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>permite chamadas para o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: You can also determine whether a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> is writable by checking the publicly accessible <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanWrite%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode determinar se um <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>é gravável verificando publicamente acessível <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanWrite%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanWrite%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: The Writeable property is set when the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> is initialized.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade Writeable é definida quando o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>é inicializado.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if data can be written to the stream; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se os dados podem ser gravados no fluxo; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of time that a write operation blocks waiting for data.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a quantidade de tempo que um blocos de operação de gravação aguardando dados.

trans-unit.source: If the write operation does not complete within the time specified by this property, the write operation throws a <xref:System.IO.IOException>.
trans-unit.target: Se a operação de gravação não for concluída dentro do tempo especificado por essa propriedade, a operação de gravação lança <xref:System.IO.IOException>.</xref:System.IO.IOException>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property affects only synchronous write operations performed by calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Essa propriedade afeta as operações de gravação síncrona apenas executadas chamando o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property does not affect asynchronous writes performed by calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não afeta as gravações assíncronas executadas chamando o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Int32> that specifies the amount of time, in milliseconds, that will elapse before a write operation fails.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Int32>que especifica a quantidade de tempo, em milissegundos, que deverá decorrer antes da falha de uma operação de gravação.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The default value, <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite>, specifies that the write operation does not time out.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão, <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite>, especifica que a operação de gravação não expira.</xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite>

trans-unit.source: The value specified is less than or equal to zero and is not <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite>.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado é menor que ou igual a zero e não é <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite>.</xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite>
